name: Bank of America Business Advantage Customized Cash Rewards Mastercard® credit card
freak_verdict: 8.7/10. This card remains a powerhouse for small businesses that can leverage the Bank of America Preferred Rewards for Business ecosystem. While the base 3% is solid, the potential for 5.25% cash back in a category of your choice makes it arguably the best no-annual-fee business card for targeted spending, provided you can park $100k in the BofA/Merrill ecosystem.
